content.rendered:
Global Trading and Sourcing‘s “bottom line benefits” improve our clients’ supply chain by providing cost-effective product sourcing solutions. GTS understands the science behind product sourcing and delivers solutions that are on-time and within budget.

Global Trading and Sourcing acts as an extension of our clients’ purchasing departments, providing sourcing and procurement of products for their manufacturing plants. The hundreds of quality manufacturers that GTS works with allow us to procure and source products regionally and on a global scale.

 

Procurement Buying Process

View Chart

 

Average Cost to Process Orders

View Chart

 

Possible Savings

View Chart

e-Procurement IT Architectures:

As business buying and procurement needs evolve, new technologies emerge to meet those needs. We are committed to successfully implementing your e-Business information technology procurement architecture.

Please contact GTS Corporation to evaluate how we can implement your current e-Procurement system in order to streamline the supply chain, reduce costs and improve profitability.

You have your system, we can help:

If you are using any e-Procurement system and would like to find out how to partner with GTS Corporation, click here.
